task.title: Reversing a Car
task.shortdesc: Learn the precise technique for safely maneuvering a car in reverse.

context.p: Reversing a car requires careful attention to the vehicle's controls and surrounding environment. Proper technique ensures smooth and safe backward movement.

step.cmd: Bring the car to a complete stop

step.info: Use the hand lever to disengage the clutch while the engine is running
Press the reverse pedal forward with the left foot
Keep the right foot free to use on the brake pedal if needed

example.p: Experienced drivers may alternatively reverse by:

ul.li: Holding the clutch pedal in neutral with the left foot
Operating the reverse pedal with the right foot

postreq.p: Exercise caution and maintain awareness of your surroundings when reversing the car.
postreq.note: Do not bring the hand lever back too far, as this may engage the rear wheel brakes.
